comments.body:
ExecutorShuffleInformation?

Config seems to suggest it is something that we can change, but really this is just saving some information passed by the executor during registration.

comments.body: also i would update the comment from "for a single Executor to find .." to "for locating the shuffle files for an executor". The old one suggests this is used by executors, but this is used by the shuffle thing.
